title: King God Castle Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the game King God Castle. The list is based on my own opinion and experience, and you may find that some heroes are better or worse for you depending on your playstyle and team composition. The heroes are ranked from S Tier (the best) to D Tier (the worst).
heading: King God Castle Tier List
introText: This is a tier list for the game King God Castle. The list is based on my own opinion and experience, and you may find that some heroes are better or worse for you depending on your playstyle and team composition. The heroes are ranked from S Tier (the best) to D Tier (the worst).

data.itemDescription: Daniel is one of the most powerful heroes in the game, with a strong AoE attack that can deal a lot of damage to multiple enemies. He is also very durable, making him a great choice for both PvP and PvE
Draco is another excellent hero for both PvP and PvE. His ability to summon dragons to fight for him makes him a very versatile hero, and he can deal a lot of damage with his ultimate ability
Kirdan is a great PvP hero who can stun enemies and deal a lot of damage. He is also very mobile, making him difficult to catch
Priya is a great PvE hero who can heal her allies and deal a lot of damage with her ultimate ability. She is also very durable, making her a great choice for tanking damage
Ace is a great all-around hero who can deal damage, tank damage, and heal his allies. He is a good choice for both PvP and PvE
Elara is a great PvP hero who can freeze enemies and deal a lot of damage. She is also very mobile, making her difficult to catch
Genie is a great PvE hero who can deal a lot of damage with his ultimate ability. He is also very durable, making him a great choice for tanking damage
Luna is a great PvP hero who can silence enemies and deal a lot of damage. She is also very mobile, making her difficult to catch
Ronan is a great PvE hero who can deal a lot of damage with his ultimate ability. He is also very durable, making him a great choice for tanking damage
Ashley is a good all-around hero who can deal damage, tank damage, and heal her allies. She is a good choice for both PvP and PvE
Cassandra is a good PvP hero who can stun enemies and deal a lot of damage. She is also very mobile, making her difficult to catch
Hawkins is a good PvE hero who can deal a lot of damage with his ultimate ability. He is also very durable, making him a great choice for tanking damage
Ingrid is a good PvP hero who can silence enemies and deal a lot of damage. She is also very mobile, making her difficult to catch
Phoenix is a good PvE hero who can deal a lot of damage with his ultimate ability. He is also very durable, making him a great choice for tanking damage
Emma is a decent all-around hero who can deal damage, tank damage, and heal her allies. However, she is not as good as the other heroes in her class
Freya is a decent PvP hero who can stun enemies and deal a lot of damage. However, she is not as good as the other heroes in her class
Gandalf is a decent PvE hero who can deal a lot of damage with his ultimate ability. However, he is not as good as the other heroes in his class
Kira is a decent PvP hero who can silence enemies and deal a lot of damage. However, she is not as good as the other heroes in her class
Valkyrie is a decent PvE hero who can deal a lot of damage with her ultimate ability. However, she is not as good as the other heroes in her class
Ares is a weak all-around hero who does not excel in any particular area. He is not recommended for either PvP or PvE
Hades is a weak PvP hero who does not deal enough damage or have enough utility to be effective. He is not recommended for PvP
